definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: We must stand side by side in our days of troubles.
sentences.chinese: 在困难的日子里，我们一定要并辅音音标肩站在一起。

sentences.english: Choose the right sound of the underlined word.
Which phonemic symbols are easiest to learn?
The phonetic spelling will tell you generally behind a word is pronounced.
sentences.chinese: 音标的拼写通常会告诉你单词是如何发音的。

sentences.english: Every day the teacher would teach him letters and phonetics as well as one sentence.
sentences.chinese: 老师每天除了从字母和音标教起，还会教他一句口语。

sentences.english: These phonetic symbols represent sounds of the human voice.
sentences.chinese: 这些音标表示人发出的声音。

sentences.english: Mrs. Han has taught us 48 phonic tone on the English Class of today.
sentences.chinese: 今天的英语课上，韩老师把48个音标全都教完。

sentences.english: We are going to learn some phonetic symbols.
The teacher transliterated the English words with the international phonetic symbols.
sentences.chinese: 老师把这些英语单词译写成国际音标。

sentences.english: The necessity and significance of the practice for international phonetic transcription.
sentences.chinese: 国际音标法实践的必要性及其意义。

sentences.english: How broad transcription and narrow transcription differ from each other? Illustrate with examples.
sentences.chinese: 宽式音标和严式音标有何区别？举例说明。

sentences.english: How broad transcription and narrow transcription differ from each other? Illustrate with examples.
sentences.chinese: 宽式音标和严式音标有何区别？举例说明。

sentences.english: Then I put a little accent and it becomes Fé, which in Brazil means faith.
sentences.chinese: 然后我加了个音标就变成Fé，在巴西是信仰的意思。

sentences.english: Lee was able to spell phonetic teachers really admire.
sentences.chinese: 而李老师却能拼出来音标，真佩服。

sentences.english: I must learn well phonic tone in order to unerstand unknown words.
sentences.chinese: 我一定要好好的运用音标，来解决不会的单词。

sentences.english: So I started to teach phonetic symbols to our Salsa friends.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我开始教我的Salsa朋友学国际音标。

definition: to pronounce a word after mentally processing its spelling/(phonics) blending
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
new word (in textbook)/word that is unfamiliar or not yet studied/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]
new character (in textbook)/character that is unfamiliar or not yet studied
the final of a Chinese syllable (the component of a syllable remaining after removal of the initial consonant, if any, and the tone, e.g. the final of "niáng" is "iang")
